programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir - EP 1
programme.desc: Marinette and Adrien are chosen to become Paris superheroes: Ladybug and Cat Noir. They each have a Miraculous, a jewel linked to magical creatures (Kwamis) that give them powers. programme.title: Horrid Henry S4 - EP 0007 & 0008
programme.desc: For Horrid Henry, life is just not fair! He feels that the rest of the world is against him and he wages a constant war against the tyranny of adults. Like any headstrong young boy, he is determined, relentless, he doesn't hold back and he never admits defeat!

programme.title: Future Card Buddyfight Ace - EP 43
programme.desc: The anime's story takes place 23 years after the events of Future Card Buddyfight X and centres on Yuga Mikado, son of Gao Mikado. Because Yuga is talented at games, he is known as the "Ace of Games." However, Buddyfight is Yuga's first card game. Yuga's buddy is Gargantua Dragon, a.k.a. Garga.

programme.title: Make It Count S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Maths can make you a whizz in the kitchen and it goes beyond knowing how to convert oven temperatures or measuring your ingredients. Find out how Mathematicians have come up with the perfect way to bake pizzas and divide them, roast potatoes, dunk biscuits in drinks, make perfectly fluffy pancakes and even get the most cream cheese on your bagel. Maths could not be any more delicious.

programme.title: Weird Food Diaries - EP 1
programme.desc: In "Weird Food Diaries", avid foodie Rosalyn Lee (also known as Rozz) goes in search of Asia's most bizarre eats. From slimy swamp worms to live delicacies, Rozz eats away across Japan, Vietnam, Cambodia, Taiwan, Thailand, Korea, Indonesia and the Philippines. Whether it's exotic street food or haute cuisine, Rozz is hungry to try it all! In this episode, there's never a dull moment in her weird food quest in the Philippines.

programme.desc: Long time ago in the universe, there were 6 Galaxy Weapons that could rule the universe. The cosmic villain Demons is trying to rule the universe with the 6 Galaxy Weapons. programme.title: Turning Mecard - EP 25
programme.desc: Jason loves the mystical minicars he hears so much about. One day, he meets Evan, a real living minicar that transforms into a creature called Mecanimal. Mecanimals are from a different world called Triforce, and have special powers to battle each other. Jason and Evan bond and realise they both need one another to find missing family members. Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!

programme.title: Extreme Football - EP 23
programme.desc: Extreme Football is an urban spin off of traditional five-a-side incorporating elements of free running and acrobatics. Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: Sky Shakers Series - EP 1
programme.desc: Andy, Sandy, Nat and Shah head out to the forest edge for a night of scientific adventure. They were hanging out in the tent when suddenly, they hear a loud crash! Nat brings home a metal sphere that he found in the forest and shows it to the Sky Shakers. Meanwhile, a furry creature makes its way to Andy's house in search of the sphere that Nat found. Little did anyone know that a group of Henchmen have just landed in the forest of Singapore, in search of the furry creature.

programme.title: Ladies, Fall In! - EP 2
programme.desc: The series follows 4 women of different ages as they participate in MINDEF's 2-day women's bootcamp. We hear from them their motivations for taking part and what they have learnt from the experience.

programme.title: Norah Jones Plays Baloise Session
programme.desc: When Norah Jones took to the world stage in 2002 with Come Away With Me, little did she guess that she would trigger a paradigm shift in pop music with her moody little disc. As a pianist her influence is jazz, but as a singer-songwriter she sits firmly in the country tradition of Hank Williams and Willie Nelson. Only the wonderful version of Cold Cold Heart on Norah Jones first album betrayed the country roots of this highly-gifted musician.

Nature's biggest beasts must go to extraordinary lengths to thrive. These are their epic survival stories!

programme.desc: (R) This is the story of ordinary little Moer - Mo Lele who uses his super power to transform into LeLe Knight to fight against the evil witch Kula and protect the manor. (重)摩尔庄园动画片讲述了一个普通的小摩尔——摩乐乐利用自己的超能力变身乐乐侠，对抗邪恶巫师库拉，保护庄园的故事。.

programme.desc: A passionate dreamer Woody, along with a baby pet dinosaur Moga, sets path to become the best pet trainer. Join Woody's journey as the action and comedy will keep your futuristic stone-age era a worthwhile adventure! 讲述梦想成为驯兽师的小男孩Woody与小宠物恐龙摩加（Moga）如何成为最佳宠物教练的冒险道路。.

programme.desc: Little Red Dot Detectives will discover interesting anecdotes about Singapore - from interesting people, historical sites to the social and cultural aspects of our tiny island.

programme.title: 星期二特写 - 我就是我 Tuesday Report - Be Myself - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) "Be Myself" is an 8 episode series produced by Tuesday Report, revealing stories of a group of young adults aged 35 years and below. Every individual has their own characteristics and beliefs. Each of them are passionate about lives, and hold unique opinions about the society. They are not afraid to face new challenges, and are determined to realise their dreams. The series aims to explore how the attitudes and values of these young adults shaped who they are today. (重)“星期二特写”八集系列《我就是我》，讲述一群三十五岁以下年轻人的精彩故事。这群年轻人有个性，有特色，有想法，对生活充满热情，对社会有独特见解，并且勇于面对生活挑战，敢于追逐自己的梦想。节目探讨年轻人的态度与价值观，看看他们如何打造自己的人生，创造一条与众不同的道路。.

programme.title: 最家选择 No Place Like Home - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Growing families often want to upgrade to a bigger flat for that extra space but upgrading also comes with its own set of concerns. How can the Tans - a family of five in this predicament use the existing schemes and grants for their benefit? And what kind of options do they have to upgrade? (重)随着家庭成员的成长，父母们总会想过是否要买一间更大的房子。但在搬进更大的房子之前，父母们也会面临许多考量。这一集，一家五口的陈家夫妇，就在考虑是否要利用现有的计划和津贴，去购买更大的组屋。而在购买房子的时候，他们会有什么样的选择呢？.

programme.title: 团圆饭 Reunion Dinner - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) The reunion dinner is very significant to Chinese: it is the gathering of the family. Through the characters' insistence on and "frenzied" preparations for the Reunion Dinner, the serial brings out the importance of the family. (重)演员:陈莉萍饰阿萍;王昱清饰梁天华;陈汉玮饰刘家昌;莫小玲饰林芳芳;鐘琴饰Banana;唐育书饰胡达雄.

programme.title: 团圆饭 Reunion Dinner - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) The reunion dinner is very significant to Chinese: it is the gathering of the family. Through the characters' insistence on and "frenzied" preparations for the Reunion Dinner, the serial brings out the importance of the family. (重)演员:陈莉萍饰阿萍;王昱清饰梁天华;陈汉玮饰刘家昌;莫小玲饰林芳芳;鐘琴饰Banana;唐育书饰胡达雄.

programme.title: 小店铺 Little Shops - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) The Hongs are simple couple. They live simply and love kids. They run a kidswear shop in Aljunied, hoping that it would be as lucrative as the industry portrayed it to be parents' money, easy to earn. But the sight of piled up stocks and their declining motivation tells us otherwise. This is not just a shop in need of renovation, but packaging as well. We all know that old habits die hard Is the change possible? (重)店主洪先生在阿裕尼二巷苦苦经营童装十几年，生意一直不好。我们发现他的店铺很小，格局普通，四面墙被铁丝网笼罩着，挂满了东西。店里店外的货品太多，整家店像个大货柜，让人却步，很难吸引人走进去。洪先生的生活不积极，每天以得过且过的态度日子。我们以小孩的角度把店铺变成一个小孩要走进去的彩色梦幻小乐园。经过装修，整间店变得明亮，服饰的摆设也时尚耀眼，店内还添了一个可爱的试衣间。.

programme.title: 古早味侦探 Old Taste Detective - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Kuay Chap was an economical snack in Teoswa in early years. Immigrants from Teoswa brought over their local braised liquid and love for pig's innards to Singapore. Each local stall has their own braised liquid recipes. Host Yi Feng and Chef KT recreate the old taste of Kuay Chap with pure rice milk. (重)早年粿汁在潮汕是一道很经济的小吃，潮汕移民南来把家乡的卤水和嗜吃猪内脏的饮食习惯带到新加坡。本地各个粿汁摊研制卤汁秘方，延续卤味香。主持人和杨建忠用纯米浆蒸制和烙制出最古早的粿片，还原米香四溢的粿汁。.

programme.title: 阿公来做饭 Ah Gong Can Cook - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Both Tosh and Kym are astonished when they found out that the Sweet & Sour Fish as well as the Sea Cucumber prepared by Ah Gong are vegetarian dishes! Is cooking vegetarian cuisine as easy as it seems? Ah Gong's Vegetarian Braised Duck is a must try vegetarian dish during CNY, learn it now to wow your family in next year Chinese New Year! (重)一桌的美味佳肴居然都是素食！今天的阿公可是烹煮斋菜的高手！对斋菜毫无概念的鐘琴和Tosh有可能复制出阿公的味道吗？烹煮素食究竟要注意什么？阿公的竹报平安最适合在过年时节吃，现在就学起来吧！.

programme.title: 梦想程式 Dream Coder - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) Jun Heng changes his mind and decides to invest in the company, much to the elation of Jing cheng. Jun Heng credits his decision to the brilliance of Hong Yi. Jing Cheng is secretly upset. (PG)(重)俊亨改变主意，决定投资，精诚高兴不已。俊亨表示欣赏宏毅的专业，知道他在科技界小有名气，不但成功开发网络游戏，还经常得奖。精诚见俊亨夸奖宏毅，众人也把功劳都归功于宏毅，心里感到不平衡。.

programme.title: 梦想程式 Dream Coder - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Jing Cheng betrays the company by stealing their new mobile application and launching it first. Hong Yi is devastated and loses his will to fight. Left without a choice, Zhen Long steps up as the new leader. (PG)(重)(大结局)精诚背叛公司，偷走即将发布的新应用程式，还抢先推出，令宏毅大感痛心，一蹶不振，镇隆只好站出来领导众人。他是否能令公司渡过难关？方如面对建明和镇隆的追求，将做何选择？而宏毅和广达也都向雅芸示爱，她将情归何处？.

programme.title: 我们的社区饭厅 Hawkers In Our Centre - EP 1
programme.desc: From street peddlers to food masters in hawker centres, hawkers have been feeding Singaporeans for over a century. How did this humble trade become our national culture and part of our DNA? 麦士威熟食中心、纽顿熟食中心、老巴刹、东海岸人工湖熟食中心…… 新加坡的小贩中心，原本只是给国人提供粮食的场所，竟意外成了游客的天堂。对本地人来说，小贩中心也不只是用餐的地方，它们是我们社区里的饭厅。小贩中心提供负担得起的食物 – 这个概念打从小贩开始出现以来，就没有改变过。一个典型的小贩中心里，总有着琳琅满目的选择，每一种都是特色相互交融的味道。咖哩鱼头、福建炒虾面、云吞面、肉脞面，还有油鸡饭面，这些让人垂涎的美食背后，有着怎么样的故事呢？.

programme.title: 学长学姐好样的！ Thumbs Up! Senior - EP 1

However, the farm owner has difficulties in marketing his products. How can the Senior help? Watch to find out! 第一集的《学长学姐好样的！》主角是一位本地室内农场老板。位于工业大厦内的室内农场运用最先进的LED光谱技术来种植蔬菜，且不用任何农药，但要开拓本地市场并不容易！究竟第一集的学姐将会使出什么法宝来帮助辛苦创业的农场老板，推广这些健康又美味的本地蔬菜呢？.

programme.title: 致胜出击 The Good Fight - EP 11
programme.desc: Yan Yifeng died after suffering a heart attack in a mixed martial arts match against Thai boxer Desri. Dongshan takes him on, only to be badly defeated. His daughter Yichen and disciples Zhengbing and Shuya decide to come together to help Dongshan revive his martial arts school to take revenge. (PG)一击道馆馆主颜东山自从儿子逸风在比赛擂台上丧命之后，将女儿逸晨、徒弟正斌和舒雅赶走，不再授徒。泰国拳王狄西佛前来踢馆，将东山打趴在地，逸晨等三人愤愤不平。逸晨为了照顾受伤的东山，搬回家里，正斌决定招生，重振道馆……。.

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.desc: (R) "A Sojourn Home" follows foreign workers from India, Bangladesh, the Philippines, Myanmar, Indonesia and more who came to Singapore to find a living. The series highlights their determination and will-power to succeed, showing us a side of foreign workers we normally do not see. (重)《新过番客》关注着一些来自印度，孟加拉，菲律宾，缅甸，印度尼西亚国家等等的外劳。他们离家背景，远来到新加坡发展和赚钱养家。这一系列的纪录片让我们看到他们的成功与失败，有些富裕的回到家乡，有些却因失败而被迫离开。这纪录片显示了他们坚强的意志，决心和勇往直前的精神，让我们看到他们的另一面。.

programme.desc: 27 year old Annabel Law is an experience wedding photographer. When she was a child, her eczema, dyslexia, and Attention Deficit Hyperactivity led her to become home schooled. Despite her unconventional education, Annabel found her direction through photography. Today, she also uses her skills to help breast cancer patients document their cancer journey. 27岁的罗嘉文是个过动儿，她也患有严重的湿疹与学习障碍症。小学退学后，她留在家里接受教育。非一般的成长过程，让她受尽了别人的歧视，并且曾经萌生自杀念头。然而，摄影让她重新找到自信与人生方向。在20岁的时候她成立了婚礼摄影公司，在捕捉新人新婚喜悦之余，她也用摄影镜头去记录乳癌患者的抗癌之旅，借此提高公众对乳癌的意识。.

programme.title: 致胜出击 The Good Fight - EP 12

Shuya has no idea as well and both of them sneak into Yifeng's room, hoping to find it. programme.title: 三生三世十里桃花 Eternal Love - EP 53

programme.title: 万福楼 Bountiful Blessings - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) Pin Hong is caught but refuses to tell anyone where Dafeng and Dong Hai are. Kitchen God tells her he can help find her lover Qing Feng. She finally relents when she is reunited with Qing Feng. (重)品红原形毕露，众人将她捉住，问她大丰和东海的下落，但品红嘴硬不肯透露。蟑螂灵机一动，表示能帮品红找到青峰。蟑螂通过月老的帮助，找到了青峰。品红与青峰重逢，恍如隔世，终于说出大丰和东海的下落。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 278
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 千年来说对不起 Till We Meet Again - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Yaojing feels down when he could not come out with creative ideas for the advertising campaign. Pierre shares his idea with Yaojing and asked for Yaojing's suggestions. Yaojing is impressed by Pier's ideas. Pierre instigates Yaojing to pitch his idea to the clients. Clients are satisfied with the idea and proved it. However, when the campaign is launch, someone exposes them for copyright issues...... (PG)(重)耀进感觉自己似乎失去灵感，无法想出一个完美的广告概念，懊恼不已。皮尔将自己的广告概念提供给他，向他指教，耀进很赞赏。皮尔怂恿他帮自己向客户展示。客户也非常满意，广告获通过。不料广告播出第一天，却被人揭发抄袭……。.

programme.title: 家简尘除 House Everything? - EP 6

programme.title: 致胜出击 The Good Fight - EP 14

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.title: 锁住味道 The Successor - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Madam Xie (82) inherited the skill of making Teochew Kueh from her grandmother when she was 15. Despite her age and failing eyesight, she insists on working tirelessly every day to produce handmade Kueh for her customers. Will she be able to find someone to inherit her skill and passion for Kueh? (重)新加坡人爱吃Kueh，而当中，潮州粿是大家都不陌生的Kueh！今年八十二岁的谢绍莺，在十五岁那年，从祖母身上学会了做粿的好手艺。如今虽然视力和体力已大不如前，但仍坚持每天在工作台上，准时揉好面团，备好材料，和员工一起为爱吃潮州粿的新加坡人，以手工制作充满诚意的潮州粿。这传统手艺是否能顺利传承下去呢？.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 21

programme.title: 新语研究所 Fun With SINGnese - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Fun with SINGnese is an infotainment series that explores the origins of local Chinese-Dialect words and how they have been passed down till now. This episode discusses how the terms Missy (nurse), Bookie (bookmaker) and Kongsi (to share) came about, and the meaning of "gang" as in Hougang. (重)《新语研究所》是富有趣味性的资讯节目，和大家轻松谈论新加坡的独特华语及方言词汇。为什么护士叫做Missy，非法接受赌注的人称为卜基？ 为什么共同分享也叫做公司？地名后港、林厝港的港指的是什么？.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) Is it true that women will do anything to find their one true love? Will they be easily deceived by others in their pursuit for it? Our fellow Martians are not spared from the dangers of lust and temptation. Don't miss out this episode as Romeo Tan makes his debut on Mars vs Venus! (重)女人一有爱情，什么都可以相信？现代女人真的比较容易在感情上受骗吗？色字头上一把刀！男人始终无法抵挡诱惑！陈罗密欧首次上这个系列的节目，他会怎么看待这个课题呢？女人们会如何为自己辩护，让大家对她们改观？.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Zhen-ai finds out that the real culprit is her immediate supervisor, Jifeng. Zhen-ai gives him time to consider if he wants to surrender and also visits Jifeng's sick wife at the hospital. Jifeng is touched by Zhen-ai's gestures and confesses to his wrong-doings. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真爱发现上司就是犯案的神秘人。真爱知道上司很担心生病的太太，于是决定给上司时间去自首，还带着食物到医院探望上司的太太。上司感动，到总公司自首，真爱终于摆脱嫌疑。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Zhiying goes to the home of Xiaohong's granny surreptitiously while she is out on tour and tries to find information of Xiaohong. Meishu also turns up there to seek her daughter. Nali is warded and unexpectedly finds Huaxin, whom she has secretly admired for a long time, as her ward mate. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)智英为了寻找小红的下落，趁着小红的奶奶外出旅游，偷偷来到了小红奶奶的家，试图找到关于小红的消息；而美淑也为了找到自己亲生女儿的消息，偷偷到那儿。娜丽到医院留医，万万没有想到同房的病人竟然是自己暗恋许久的华信。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 77
programme.desc: Feeling devastated, Haizhu wants to end her life. Zhiyuan tries to save her but ends up in danger herself. Meanwhile, Dao Ying leaves his entire estate to Daozhi and leaves the WID Group. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)海珠感到绝望，走向大海自尽，智媛立刻阻止却遭危险。道英将前会长真正的遗嘱和公司给道治了，便默默离开。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 78
programme.desc: Haizhu is sentenced to two years' jail and gives birth to a baby. Daozhi bumps into Dao Ying and realizes Zhiyuan is suffering from dementia. Ruli finally acknowledges Zhiyuan as her mother. (PG)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)海珠被判刑两年也在监狱里生下小孩。道治查到道英跟智媛在一起生活而智媛患有失智症。如莉最终接受智媛为生母。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 11

Mei Qi confesses that all she wanted to do was to seek revenge on Nadia and Nadia apologizes to Mei Qi repeatedly for her mistake in the past. She goes on to tell Mei Qi her deepest secret; that she was the original "True Liar"... (PG-些许暴力画面)Nadia对美琪坦白，知道她是大话精，劝她悬崖勒马，因为代价太大！美琪露出真实面目，表明要对Nadia报复泄恨，Nadia对妹妹忏悔，说了隐藏多年的秘密，原来Nadia是第一个大话精，妹妹会被拐走，是因为她撒谎的代价。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 19
programme.desc: Shunzi refuses to work with Shangbi to bring Wenshu down. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)尚弼到牢里跟顺子见面，要她抖出文淑藏有秘密帐簿的事。顺子本来不想跟尚弼合作，但文淑突然跟顺子见面，并表明一直以来只是把顺子当成一枚棋子利用。顺子知道自己已经被文淑抛弃了，于是答应跟尚弼合作。.

programme.title: 十大新加坡 Top 10 Singapore - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Though Singaporeans may joke about how we are a "fine" city with our harsh rules against littering, not many know much about our laws aside from the strict anti-drug laws. programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Zhen-ai takes up the role of Yingshan's secretary. Dongchu considers renting a room to Xuncai so as to help raise money for Hengshun to repay his study loan. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)英善问真爱是否愿意当她的秘书，真爱开心答应。东出为了帮亨顺缴助学贷款，考虑将房间租给勋才。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Weather forecast presenters are discussing why there is no replacement after Nali is fired. Meishu eventually selects Zhang Zhuxi, the junior who deliberately asked Nali out for a drink and dirtied her clothing before her broadcast, as the replacement. At the same time, Nali received a call from the broadcast chief just after her surgery. He offers a reinstatement and wants Nali to rush over. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)气象播报员们在工作室里讨论为什么公司解雇了娜丽后没有安排人接她的工作。美淑最终选中了那个故意在开播前约娜丽出去喝酒，弄脏娜丽衣服的后辈张珠熙。另一方面，刚刚做完手术出来的娜丽接到报导局长的复职提案电话，让她立马过去。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 1
programme.desc: Tongxi's cousin, Zhemin, steals her laptop and his grandmother's stamp before he leaves for Taiwan to flee from his creditors. Tongxi goes to Taiwan to search for Zhemin, but she is captured by a group of hooligans instead. (PG)(首播)(双声道-中/韩)吴彤熙的表哥徐哲民为了躲避债主而拿着彤熙的笔电和奶奶的印章逃到台湾去。彤熙到台湾找哲民，跟哲民一起被流氓捉走。.

programme.title: Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 2
programme.desc: Chengjun and his colleague save Tongxi from the hands of the hooligans by chance. Chengjun feels pity for Tongxi when he sees her weeping as she speaks to her granny over the phone. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)成俊和制作人误打误撞把彤熙从流氓的手里救出来。成俊看到彤熙拨电给奶奶时，一把眼泪一把鼻涕的样子，很同情彤熙。.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 6
programme.desc: This episode, Pornsak explores the processing of coconuts & coconut milk production in Thailand and milk source & milk processing in Australia. Cui Fang also learns about the cultivation of mangoes and production of dried mangoes in Philippines as well as tasting the Naxi's chickpea jelly in Yunnan. 在这一集节目中，Pornsak前往泰国尖竹汶府一窥椰子的加工和椰浆的制作。他也来到澳大利亚了解牛奶的取得及加工。林翠芳则前往菲律宾体验芒果的种植和芒果干的制作，并来到云南体验纳西文化品尝鸡豆凉粉。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 20
programme.desc: Lianxi is initially hopeful when she hears that Wenshu will soon take over Shunzi's case. However, Wenshu wants Lianxi to persuade Shunzi to plead guilty in court. Lianxi is shocked to realise that Wenshu wants Shunzi to be her scapegoat. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)莲希听说文淑即将担任顺子案件的法官，本来很放心，但文淑却要莲希劝顺子在庭上认罪。莲希知道文淑要母亲独自背负所有的罪名，不可置信。.

programme.title: 购物王路易 Shopaholic Louis - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Growing up in a protected environment, the heir of a big enterprise, Jiang Zhicheng, is nicknamed Shopaholic Louis. After losing both parents in an accident, his fawning grandmother sends him to France to live an aristocratic life away from family. When Louis receives news that his grandmother has been warded due to high fever, he rushes back to Korea to visit his only kin in the world. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)在温室里长大的大企业继承者姜智成别名「购物王」路易。在一次车祸丧失了父母后,宠爱他的奶奶便把他送去法国与家人分开两地过着贵族般的生活。当路易接到在韩国的奶奶因高烧入了医院的消息时，他火速回国去探望这位世上唯一的亲人。.

programme.title: Shopaholic Louis - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) After the passing of her grandmother, Fushi, a village girl who has been isolated from the outside world for a long time, travels alone to Seoul. She wants to look for her brother Funan who is studying there. While looking for Funan, she runs into Louis who has become a homeless person after suffering amnesia... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)原本与奶奶生活，远离文明世界的村姑福实因奶奶突然去世，便只身去都市寻她那在城市首尔上学的弟弟福南，要与他相依为命。福实在街上寻找弟弟福南时，发现了意外患上失忆症，变成露宿者的路易......

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Tai Long is low on confidence after losing his sense of taste. Will Tai Long ever regain his taste? Will Owen's mother return? Who will Meiwei end up with? Who will lose the competition and be barred from cooking again? What is the fate that awaits the Nanyang eatery? (PG)(重)(大结局)泰虎以‘海南鸡饭’向泰龙挑战！泰龙因失去了味觉，信心不再；‘看不到’味道的泰龙，坚称自己煮的鸡饭不如泰虎煮的鸡饭。泰龙深怕自己输了这场比赛，因为这一次，落败的一方将永远不准再当厨师。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Palawan, a diving and snorkelling paradise, is the last ecological land in Philippines. Due to economic interests and no environmental awareness, the forests are cash cows and illegal logging is rampant. Let's follow fixer to the forest to track down illegal loggers and learn about illegal logging. (重)(大结局)巴拉望岛是潜水和浮潜的乐园，也是菲律宾最后一块生态净土，因为经济利益的关系，环保意识的不普及，将森林视为摇钱树，非法砍伐活动猖獗。让我们跟随线人走进森林，追踪非法伐木者, 了解当地非法砍伐的问题。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Shanyu is shocked to see Xuncai at home. She thinks Hengkui will not like Xuncai to stay with them as he values privacy. To everyone's surprise, however, Hengkui welcomes Xuncai. programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 4

programme.title: Shopaholic Louis - EP 3

Zhongyuan's mother tells her husband she will arrange a blind date for their son again as he still does not have a girlfriend. Fushi sees the granny who stole her bag on the train last time. programme.title: Shopaholic Louis - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Zhongyuan pushes Fushi in a dispute. Fushi falls and faints. Zhongyuan feels guilty and rushes Fushi to the hospital. When Fushi wakes up, Zhongyuan pays Fushi for the wild ginseng and offers her a job at the product planning department. Fushi and Louis shop for daily necessities and clothes at the market when Fushi has the money. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)福实与中元起争执之时，中元推了福实一下，福实倒地就昏过去了。中元感到内疚，急忙送福实去医院。中元在福实醒来后还了她山参的钱又给了她工作，叫她到商品企划室上班 !福实手上有了点钱，与路易去市场为新屋添日常生活用品和购买一些衣物。.

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Barcelona, Spain. A city that celebrates the arts. Every corner is coloured with passion and originality. The city attracts many people who wish to pursue their artistic aspirations. These artists have made much quiet sacrifices. On this path to success, what trials do they go through? (重)拥有两千年历史的巴塞罗那，是西班牙的艺术重镇，每一个角落都充满了色彩、激情和创意,吸引不少追求艺术梦想的人到那里生活。为了追求艺术，离乡背井的艺术家，有太多不为人知的付出和牺牲。在功成名就以前，他们到底需要克服多少离愁？承受多少寂寞呢？.

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) The topics of this episode is soy sauce and vinegar. Vinegar is produced from grains in the East, from fruits and wine in the West. Soy sauce is derived from sauce. (重)这一集的节目主题是酱油和醋。东方以谷物酿造醋，而西方却是以水果和葡萄酒酿醋。酱油则是由酱演变而来。郭亮，阿贤和Pornsak会为我们介绍亚洲和东南亚各地的酱油，意大利和法国醋的历史，制作和用法。.

programme.title: 加文纳桥的约定 Love At Cavenagh Bridge - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Every year, on this day, scriptwriter Han Liang and rich married woman Lina would put down all their family and work commitments, and meet each other on Cavenagh Bridge. This special day is the anniversary of the day they first met That fateful year, Han Liang was at the lowest point of his career, and Lina was distraught by her husband's betrayal. They were at the bridge to end their lives when they met each other, and somehow helped each other find a reason to live on. (PG)(重)每一年的这一天，编剧汉良和富太莉娜都会放下工作，放下家庭，放下所有重要事情，风雨不改来到加纹纳桥上“幽会"。原来这一天是两人多年前的“相逢纪念日"……那一年，失意的编剧碰上被老公劈腿的贵妇，两人本来生无可恋，却在自杀前互相鼓励，互相扶持，竟然一起度过难关，走出阴霾。逐渐地，两人的关系已经升华得比自己枕边人更重要的地位。两人发乎情却止于礼，可是这算不算是一种精神出轨呢？.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 8

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 8
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.
